title: 2.0.0d5 is missing a #pragma warning(pop), confusing VS, disabling warnings in code including catch
body:
Using v2.0.0-develop.5, on Visual Studio 2017 15.5 Preview 2, seeing: 

    single_include\catch.hpp(978): warning C5032: detected #pragma warning(push) with no corresponding #pragma warning(pop)

It appears Visual Studio gets its warning state all confused when a `#include` has mismatching `push`/`pop` statements.  For me, it's having the effect of dramatically decreasing the warning level in any of my code that includes `catch.hpp`.  (I think it has the effect of setting the warning level to 0.)

I did look through the structure of the `#pragma warhing(push|pop)`, as shown below.  It's right.

I also get some warnings that aren't temporarily disabled.  So, I've commented out all of the `#pragma warning(push|pop)` statements, and I'm wrapping it with a `#pragma warning(push, 0)` temporarily.

    :    24 #ifdef __clang__
    :    25 #   ifdef __ICC
    :    26 #       pragma warning(push)
    ...
    :    28 #   else
    ...
    :    45 #endif
    ...
    :   532 #ifdef _MSC_VER
    :   533 #pragma warning(push)
    ...
    :   535 #endif
    ...
    :   970 #ifdef _MSC_VER
    :   971 #pragma warning(pop)
    :   972 #endif
    ....
    :   977 #ifdef  _MSC_VER
    :   978 #pragma warning(push)
    ...
    :   983 #endif
    ....
    :  7961 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
    :  7962 #pragma warning(push)
    ...
    :  7964 #endif
    ...    
    :  7974 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
    :  7975 #pragma warning(pop)
    :  7976 #endif
    ...
    : 11936 #ifdef __clang__
    : 11937 #    ifdef __ICC
    : 11938 #        pragma warning(pop)
    : 11939 #    else
    ...
    : 11944 #540 

And, here's the warnings that show with `catch.hpp` as-is, in files that include it without `#define CATCH_CONFIG_MAIN`:

    catch.hpp(158): warning C4668: 'WINAPI_FAMILY' is not defined as a preprocessor macro, replacing with '0' for '#if/#elif'
    catch.hpp(158): warning C4668: 'WINAPI_FAMILY_APP' is not defined as a preprocessor macro, replacing with '0' for '#if/#elif'
    catch.hpp(978): warning C5032: detected #pragma warning(push) with no corresponding #pragma warning(pop)

And, here's the warnings that show with `catch.hpp` included after `#define CATCH_CONFIG_MAIN`:

```
C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\include\10.0.16299.0\um\winbase.h(7356): warning C5039: 'TpSetCallbackCleanupGroup': pointer or reference to potentially throwing function passed to extern C function under -EHc. Undefined behavior may occur if this function throws an exception.
catch.hpp(7169): error C4996: 'std::uncaught_exception': warning STL4006: std::uncaught_exception() is deprecated in C++17. It is superseded by std::uncaught_exceptions(), plural. You can define _SILENCE_CXX17_UNCAUGHT_EXCEPTION_DEPRECATION_WARNING or _SILENCE_ALL_CXX17_DEPRECATION_WARNINGS to acknowledge that you have received this warning.
  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\Preview\Community\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.12.25816\include\exception(17): note: see declaration of 'std::uncaught_exception'
catch.hpp(10604): warning C4061: enumerator 'Catch::`anonymous-namespace'::Duration::Unit::Auto' in switch of enum 'Catch::`anonymous-namespace'::Duration::Unit' is not explicitly handled by a case label
  catch.hpp(10556): note: see declaration of 'Catch::`anonymous-namespace'::Duration::Unit'
catch.hpp(10604): warning C4061: enumerator 'Catch::`anonymous-namespace'::Duration::Unit::Nanoseconds' in switch of enum 'Catch::`anonymous-namespace'::Duration::Unit' is not explicitly handled by a case label
  catch.hpp(10556): note: see declaration of 'Catch::`anonymous-namespace'::Duration::Unit'
catch.hpp(10620): warning C4061: enumerator 'Catch::`anonymous-namespace'::Duration::Unit::Auto' in switch of enum 'Catch::`anonymous-namespace'::Duration::Unit' is not explicitly handled by a case label
  catch.hpp(10556): note: see declaration of 'Catch::`anonymous-namespace'::Duration::Unit'
catch.hpp(11559): warning C4061: enumerator 'Catch::ResultWas::Exception' in switch of enum 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType' is not explicitly handled by a case label
  catch.hpp(1132): note: see declaration of 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType'
catch.hpp(11559): warning C4061: enumerator 'Catch::ResultWas::Unknown' in switch of enum 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType' is not explicitly handled by a case label
  catch.hpp(1132): note: see declaration of 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType'
catch.hpp(11559): warning C4061: enumerator 'Catch::ResultWas::Ok' in switch of enum 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType' is not explicitly handled by a case label
  catch.hpp(1132): note: see declaration of 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType'
catch.hpp(11559): warning C4061: enumerator 'Catch::ResultWas::FailureBit' in switch of enum 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType' is not explicitly handled by a case label
  catch.hpp(1132): note: see declaration of 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType'
catch.hpp(11559): warning C4061: enumerator 'Catch::ResultWas::ExpressionFailed' in switch of enum 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType' is not explicitly handled by a case label
  catch.hpp(1132): note: see declaration of 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType'
catch.hpp(11559): warning C4061: enumerator 'Catch::ResultWas::DidntThrowException' in switch of enum 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType' is not explicitly handled by a case label
  catch.hpp(1132): note: see declaration of 'Catch::ResultWas::OfType'
catch.hpp(4857): warning C4583: 'Catch::clara::detail::ResultValueBase<T>::m_value': destructor is not implicitly called
          with
          [
              T=Catch::clara::detail::ParseState
          ]
  catch.hpp(4857): note: while compiling class template member function 'Catch::clara::detail::ResultValueBase<T>::~ResultValueBase(void)'
          with
          [
              T=Catch::clara::detail::ParseState
          ]
  catch.hpp(5117): note: see reference to function template instantiation 'Catch::clara::detail::ResultValueBase<T>::~ResultValueBase(void)' being compiled
          with
          [
              T=Catch::clara::detail::ParseState
          ]
  catch.hpp(4874): note: see reference to class template instantiation 'Catch::clara::detail::ResultValueBase<T>' being compiled
          with
          [
              T=Catch::clara::detail::ParseState
          ]
  catch.hpp(5114): note: see reference to class template instantiation 'Catch::clara::detail::BasicResult<Catch::clara::detail::ParseState>' being compiled
catch.hpp(978): warning C5032: detected #pragma warning(push) with no corresponding #pragma warning(pop)
```
